trans-unit.source: This class contains column schema extension methods for <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe contém os métodos de extensão do esquema de colunas para <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> to be checked for column schema support.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> a ser verificado para suporte de esquema de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> can get a column schema.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> pode obter um esquema de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> can get a column schema; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> puder obter um esquema de coluna; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> to return the column schema.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> para retornar o esquema de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column schema (<see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbColumn" /> collection) for a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o esquema da coluna (coleção <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbColumn" />) para um <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.

trans-unit.source: The column schema (<see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbColumn" /> collection) for a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: O esquema da coluna (coleção <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbColumn" />) para um <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
